price: Basi mbona wale walio washika badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu, kuwa ati hao ndio wawakurubishe, hawakuwanusuru? Bali waliwapotea! Na huo ndio uwongo walio kuwa wakiuzua.
arabic: فَلَوۡلَا نَصَرَهُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ قُرۡبَانًا ءَالِهَةَۢۖ بَلۡ ضَلُّواْ عَنۡهُمۡۚ وَذَٰلِكَ إِفۡكُهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ
footnotes: Basi kwani hao walio wafanya miungu badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu ili iwakaribishe kwa Mwenyezi Mtukufu imeweza kuwakinga na maangamizo? Hasha! Bali miungu hiyo iliwakimbia, na hali wao ndio wana haja nayo mno iwanusuru. Na hayo yaliyo wafika, ya kutupwa na miungu yao, na kuwapotea ndio matokeo ya uwongo wao na uzushi wao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: falawlā naṣarahumu alladhīna ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi qur'bānan ālihatan bal ḍallū ʿanhum wadhālika if'kuhum wamā kānū yaftarūna
translations: gods as a way of approach
gods as a way of approach
